location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'The Shatt-el-Arab at Basra'. Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:150 x 193 mmCondition:The print is in good condition throughout.Foliation:‘26’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of the Shatt-el-Arab at Basra. In the foreground and middle-ground at let two canoe-like boats hold two men each. In the background the arsenal, the entrance to Ashar Creek and the customs house are marked in ink on the photograph.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'The Shatt-el-Arab at Basra'Pencil, above image to the right: ‘26’Ink, inscribed on image: ‘Arsenal’; ‘entrance to Ashar Creek’; ‘Customs House’
